PageWidgetPortable.Title: Atividades Realizadas na Semana
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.DIRETOR_REGIONAL.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.DATACONCLUSAO BETWEEN @SEMANA[1] AND @SEMANA[2] AND A.VERTICAL IN (SELECT VERTICAL FROM K_CRM_DIRETORVERTICAL WHERE NOME=@USUARIO)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdAtividadesVertical</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Atividades Realizadas na Semana</Description> <Icon>fa fa-cog fa-spin</Icon> <Color>green-jungle</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Atividades Pendentes
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.DIRETOR_REGIONAL.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUS = 1 AND A.DATACONCLUSAO IS NULL AND A.DATAAGENDAMENTO < @HOJE AND A.VERTICAL IN (SELECT VERTICAL FROM K_CRM_DIRETORVERTICAL WHERE NOME=@USUARIO)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdAtividadesPendentesVertical</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Atividades Pendentes</Description> <Icon>fa fa-clock-o</Icon> <Color>blue</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Atividades para hoje
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.DIRETOR_REGIONAL.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUS = 1 AND A.DATACONCLUSAO IS NULL AND A.DATAAGENDAMENTO >= DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day,0,GETDATE()),0) AND A.DATAAGENDAMENTO < DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day,0,GETDATE())+1,0) AND A.VERTICAL IN (SELECT VERTICAL FROM K_CRM_DIRETORVERTICAL WHERE NOME=@USUARIO)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdAtividadesHojeVertical</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Atividades para hoje</Description> <Icon>fa fa-clock-o</Icon> <Color>yellow-gold</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Atividades Futuras
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.DIRETOR_REGIONAL.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUS = 1 AND A.DATACONCLUSAO IS NULL AND A.DATAAGENDAMENTO > DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day,0,GETDATE())+1,0) AND A.VERTICAL IN (SELECT VERTICAL FROM K_CRM_DIRETORVERTICAL WHERE NOME=@USUARIO)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdAtividadesFuturasVertical</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Atividades Futuras</Description> <Icon>fa fa-line-chart</Icon> <Color>blue</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Minhas Verticais
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAVERTICAL.HEAD.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.VERTICAL IN (SELECT VERTICAL FROM K_CRM_DIRETORVERTICAL WHERE NOME=@USUARIO)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>REDIRECT_CONTAS_VERTICAL</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Minhas Verticais</Description> <Icon>fa fa-user</Icon> <Color>default</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Minhas Oportunidades
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUSOPORTUNIDADE NOT IN (7,14,15,16,17,18) AND A.VERTICAL IN (SELECT VERTICAL FROM K_CRM_DIRETORVERTICAL WHERE NOME=@USUARIO)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>REDIRECT_OPORTUNIDADES_VERTICAL</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Minhas Oportunidades</Description> <Icon>fa fa-dollar</Icon> <Color>default</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Oportunidades Vencidas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.DATAFECHAMENTO < GETDATE() AND A.STATUSOPORTUNIDADE NOT IN (7,14,15,16,17,18,19,20) AND A.VERTICAL IN (SELECT VERTICAL FROM K_CRM_DIRETORVERTICAL WHERE NOME=@USUARIO)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>REDIRECT_OPORTUNIDADES_VENCIDAS_VERTICAL</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Oportunidades Vencidas</Description> <Icon>fa fa-dollar</Icon> <Color>red</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Suportes em Aberto
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_CHAMADOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.USUARIOINCLUSAO = @USUARIO AND A.STATUS IN (1)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>REDIRECT_MEUS_CHAMADOS</CommandName> <Value>HANDLE</Value> <Description>Suportes em Aberto</Description> <Icon>fa fa-list</Icon> <Color>blue</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Meus Semáforos
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOASEMAFORO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.PESSOA IN (SELECT PESSOA FROM K_CRM_PESSOAVERTICAL WHERE VERTICAL IN (SELECT VERTICAL FROM K_CRM_DIRETORVERTICAL WHERE NOME=@USUARIO))</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>REDIRECT_SEMAFORO_VERTICAL</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Meus Semáforos</Description> <Icon>fa fa-check</Icon> <Color>blue-hoki</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>
